Specifications.Materials:
[body] GORE-TEX® Pro 3L, 70d nylon plain-weave face with a nylon micro-grid backer & DWR finish
140 gsm - 100% nylon
bluesign approved fabrics
Specifications.Weather Resistance:
Waterproof, Windproof & breathable
Durable water-repellent finish
Specifications.Pockets:
[exterior] 1 zip chest pocket, 2 zip hand pockets
[internal] 1 stretch media pocket with cord port
Specifications.Recommended Use: Rock & Ice Climbing, Trekking, All-Season Backcountry Adventures, Wet, Rainy & Snowy Conditions
